name: read-xaffinity-resource
description: Read an xaffinity:// resource by URI. Available resources: xaffinity://me (current user), xaffinity://me/person-id (user's person ID), xaffinity://interaction-enums (interaction type/direction enums)

uri.description: The xaffinity:// resource URI to read (e.g., xaffinity://me, xaffinity://me/person-id, xaffinity://interaction-enums)
